titleStmt.title: A list of the preachers appointed by the Lord Bishop of London, to preach in the city and suburbs of London, in Lent, 1690. on Wednesdays and Fridays, in the churches of St. Peter Cornhil. St. Sepulchres. St Brides. St. Paul's Covent-Garden.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
